thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Investors Are Selling Bonds Everywhere—but for Different Reasons

author: Jon Sindreu
title: Investors Are Selling Bonds Everywhere—but for Different Reasons
text:
Investors on both sides of the Atlantic are dumping government debt, but for different reasons.
In the U.S., they see more inflation coming; in the eurozone, they see stronger economic growth.
The different stages of each economy explain the varying assessments by investors, analysts say. While the U.S. expansion has lasted 8½ years, the eurozone...
